alignment.description: Should the item be placed to the left or right?

arguments.description: Arguments to pass to the command handler

color.description: The foreground color for this item

filterFileRegex.description:
Show only if the current file's path matches this regex.
Requires double escaping

Example: ".*\.ext"

filterLanguageRegex.description:
Show only if current file's language matches this regex.
Requires double escaping

Example: "markdown"

filterWorskspaceFileRegex.description:
Show only if a file's path that matches this regex is found in the workspace.
Requires double escaping

Example: "**/.*\.ext"

priority.description: The priority of this item. Higher value means the item should be shown more to the left

text.description: The text to show for the entry

tooltip.description: The tooltip text when you hover over this item
